Traits.Name: Feast
Traits.Description: Devour only costs 1 action for this Demon, and it can dash 1 before using it.

Traits.Name: Engorge
Traits.Description: Increase size by 1 and gains +1 action for the rest of combat if it feasted.

Actions.Name: Flesh Hook
Actions.Description: A character in range 4 must pass a save or be shoved towards the demon as much as possible.

Actions.Name: Cleave
Actions.Description: Deal piercing fray damage as an effect to an adjacent character.
